name: Massaging Jade Textured Facial Roller
about: What it is:A textured jade roller designed to massage the face and help products penetrate deeper into the skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dullness and Uneven Texture.What Else You Need to Know:Due to natural variations in stone, every tool is unique in pattern and color. The above statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This item is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start in the middle of the face and roll outwards across the cheeks..-Move to the eyebrows and roll upwards across the forehead..-Move below the lower lip and roll downward across the chin.
